instruction: Describe the evolution of deep learning.
output: Deep learning has evolved over the past few decades, beginning with the development of artificial neural networks and moving on to include increasingly complex algorithms and architectures. In recent years it has provided breakthroughs in computer vision, natural language processing, and reinforcement learning. Deep learning has been used to develop self-driving cars, facial recognition, virtual assistants, and more. As the technology continues to advance, deep learning is set to revolutionize many areas of research and industry.
